attributes.action: Bring in legislation to make "Daytime Running Lights" compulsory for all vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am sure that many of you will agree that a vehicle is more visible with its lights on.  As it is there are far too many motorists who fail to put there lights on in reduced visibility (bad rain, fog, etc...).  If someone cannot do that, what chance do we have of seeing their silhouette as they drive "out of the sun".  With a bright light such as the sun behind you, you are m,uch more likely to be seen if you lights are on.

Therefore, I propose it be made mandatory, as are seatbelts.
